import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Formik from 'formik' import yup from 'yup' function ProfileEdit() { const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth) const [imageUrl, setImageUrl] = useState('') if (user) { return (
setImageUrl(e.currentTarget.files[0])} className="w-70 form-control form-control-sm" id="formFileSm" type="file" />
) } else { return ( <> ) } } export default ProfileEdit
